item.title: Cases of norovirus on the rise with double the rate of positive tests since August
item.description: Cases of norovirus are rising across the United States, doubling over the last few months, according to updated data from the CDC.

item.title: The Fed is divided over cutting interest rates. Here's why that matters
item.description: Sentiment has shifted dramatically in favor of an interest rate cut.
